channel.title: Words from AM signs decoded
channel.description:
I took a look at the sign that says Black Mesa Security force. If you look at the texture files you can see words they say:
I read text of internet here no really go ahead and picture something cool in your minds eye make something up of what you would like for this to say
If you can read this shit than you are really freak in a strange... with good eyesight
There are other signs that say stuff like "If you can really read this" but the rest I cant see. In the texture, the file for the barney picture is C1A0_flipsign04 and you can find it there. :slight_smile: ![C1A0_FLIPSIGN4.jpg|192x144](upload://tIUPnui8E2Gu5xLAoznTFO7X3YM.jpeg)

item.description:

item.title: Words from AM signs decoded
item.dc:creator: HawkeyE
item.description:
The attachments suck: BMSF, BMSF2

I’m pretty sure it says:

BLACK MESA
SECURITY FORCE

Insert text of interest here.
no really
go ahead and picture
something cool
in your mind[’]s eye
make something up of what
you would like for this to say

If you can read this shit
then you are really
[fuckin strange…]
with good eyes[ight]

I’m not really sure if that last word is eyesight, or if it says “fuckin strange…”. I figured 10 minutes was more than enough time to waste on this. :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Words from AM signs decoded
item.dc:creator: wcability109
item.description:
Dias:

Or that you actually know how to enlarge pictures.

Any idea of what the other pictures say?

Nah they have bad contrast, but with a little hard work, you might be able to see a few words and guess. I will try

item.title: Words from AM signs decoded
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
It’s “mind’s eye” and “you have really good eyesight” not “myself”.

Also it’s “make something up of what” not “my hat”

Read full topic

I took a look at the sign that says Black Mesa Security force. If you look at the texture files you can see words they say:

freak in a strange…
